abilities.name: Photosynthesis
abilities.effect: All Energy cards attached to Erika's Oddish provide Grass Energy instead of their usual type. This power works even while Erika's Oddish is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Poisonpowder
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
